title: Avail 8/1 or 9/1 Newly Renovated JP 2BD w/Parking & Laundry Close to T
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302788369', 'Rent: $2,850 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'Available to move in August or September 1st -', 'This newly renovated top floor 2 bedroom gets tons of natural light and is in a great location.', 'The apartment features newly refinished hardwood floors, updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, new cabinets, and stone counter tops, the bathroom was beautifully redone with a fully tiled stand up shower and skylight.', 'Both bedrooms have custom closets, and there is private laundry in the basement.', 'There is one off street parking spot included, and a beautifully manicured shared back yard.', 'The location is hard to beat with Wholefoods, CVS, great restaurants and bars and the Green Line just moments away.', 'Don’t hesitate to call or email us to schedule a time to view this lovely apartment.', 'FIRST, LAST, BROKER FEE DUE W/1 YEAR LEASE.', 'PETS NEGOTIABLE.']
